Cookbook: recipes from the Project27 household

Cookbook is a volume of recipes from the Project27 author household.

Meat

Meat is the essence of these dishes.

Give me meaty recipes

Fish

Everything revolves around fish.

Give me a fish dish

Risotto

All that cheese and rice.

Give me a risotto meal

Pasta

Pasta if there is nothing else to eat.

Give me a saucy pasta recipe

Soup

Soup is good!

Give me a soup to scoop

Salad

Salad is the path to heaven, if the roads of meat are congested.

Give me some salad

Wraps and burritos

Let's rol and roll and roll.

Give me a thing to roll

Breakfast and desserts

Who says it's too early for desserts? Have something sweet, as dinner or as breakfast.

Give me something sweet
